TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SessionSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 定义包含数据与会话相关的安全标记。

span.span: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话令牌存储例如会话的用户与会话，以及定义会话; 其他参数相关联的开始和结束时间。A session token stores the of the user that is associated with a session as well as other parameters that define the session; for example the session start and end times. 在被动方案中，调入(SAM) 中创建的会话令牌的身份验证管道表示已经过身份验证的用户。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 使用其配置创建令牌和其序列化到 cookie （以及要反序列化中的后续请求的 cookie 令牌）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 使用其已配置的实例类将写回到 HTTP 响应的 cookie。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 保存的 cookie，然后返回到客户端和客户端可以在后续请求提供 cookie，而不是无需进行一次往返过程返回到要重新获取安全令牌的标识提供程序。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 有关会话如何运行使用 WIF 的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). 在 Web 场方案中使用会话的信息，请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 会话令牌可以在任何一种引用模式运行，或不。A session token can operate in either reference mode or not. 如果会话令牌不在引用模式下操作时，将整个标记是序列化到客户端存储的会话 cookie。If the session token is not operating in reference mode, the entire token is serialized into the session cookie that is stored on the client. 序列化的会话令牌可能会很大，因此存储在客户端上的 cookie 也可以是相当相当大。The serialized session token can be quite large and thus the cookie stored on the client can also be quite sizeable. 在引用模式下，而不是序列化整个会话为 cookie 令牌，令牌存储在会话安全标记缓存并仅用于生成密钥从缓存中检索令牌所需的信息存储在 cookie 中。In reference mode, rather than serializing the entire session token into the cookie, the token is stored in a session security token cache and only the information used to generate the key necessary to retrieve the token from the cache is stored in the cookie. 这可以大大降低的 cookie 的大小。This can greatly reduce the size of the cookie. 由派生类实现令牌缓存的会话，由实现缓存键类。The session token cache is implemented by a class derived from and the cache key is implemented by the class. 并将使用属性类生成的缓存键。The and properties are used in the class to generate the cache key. 属性确定会话令牌是否在引用模式下。The property determines whether the session token is in reference mode or not. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作提供的处理程序的 Microsoft 建议中的 global.asax.cs 文件和设置事件令牌上的属性中传递属性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌引用的每个请求的模式下运行，并且更倾向于只设置会话身份验证模块上的属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. 提供使用 WIF 类序列化作为 Ws-secure Conversation 会话令牌``元素。The class provided with WIF serializes the session token as a WS-Secure Conversation `` element.

span.span: WIF Session Management
WIF and Web Farms

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`null`| ||设置为生成的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||| ||设置为生成的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| || 再加上属性。 plus the property.| ||`null`| ||包含生成的 128 位的对称密钥。Contains a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 的默认实现不使用此属性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 签名和加密密钥由应用的 cookie 转换处理该令牌。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||| || 再加上属性。 plus the property.|

param.span: 与此会话关联的声明主体。

span.span: The claims principal that is associated with this session.

param.name: contextId
param.span: 与此标志关联的一个上下文标识符。

span.span: The context identifier associated with this token.

param.name: context
param.span: 一个应用程序特定的可选上下文字符串。

span.span: An optional, application-specific context string.

param.name: endpointId
param.span: 此标记所绑定的终点结。

span.span: The endpoint to which this token is bound.

param.span: 空字符串将创建未区分范围的标记。

span.span: An empty string creates an unscoped token.

param.name: validFrom
param.span: 标记变为有效的时间时刻。

span.span: The time instant at which the token becomes valid.

param.span: 如果为 ，则指定

span.span: to specify

param.name: validTo
param.span: 其后时间不再有效的时间时刻。

span.span: The time instant after which the token is no longer valid.

param.span: 如果为 ，则指定应通过将 属性的值添加到 validFrom 参数指定的时间来确定值。

span.span: to specify that the value should be determined by adding the value of the property to the time specified by the validFrom parameter.

param.name: key
param.span: 一个可选的对称会话密钥。

span.span: An optional symmetric session key.

summary.span: 使用指定的主体、上下文 ID、上下文、终结点、开始时间、过期时间和密钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified principal, context ID, context, endpoint, start time, expiration time, and key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`context`| ||`contextId`| ||`endpointId`| ||设置为生成的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||设置为值属性由`ValidFrom`参数。Set to the value of the property as determined by the `ValidFrom` parameter.| ||值属性由`ValidTo`参数。The value of the property as determined by the `ValidTo` parameter.| ||`null`| ||包含单个元素，则`key`; 如果`key`是`null`，生成的 128 位的对称密钥。Contains single element that is either `key` or, if `key` is `null`, a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 的默认实现不使用此属性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 签名和加密密钥由应用的 cookie 转换处理该令牌。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||值`validFrom`参数，或者，如果`validFrom`是`null`， 。The value of the `validFrom` parameter, or, if `validFrom` is `null`, .| ||`validFrom` 参数的值。The value of the `validFrom` parameter. 如果`validFrom`是`null`的值属性 (由`validFrom`参数) 以及属性。If `validFrom` is `null`, the value of the property (as determined by the `validFrom` parameter) plus the property.|

public: property System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ ClaimsPrincipal { System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与此会话关联的声明主体。

span.span: Gets the claims principal associated with the session.
The claims principal.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As String
public: property System::String ^ Context { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户指定上下文的值。

span.span: Gets a user specified context value.
The user specified context value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于存储特定于应用程序的上下文。You can use this property to store application-specific context.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContextId As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ ContextId { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取会话上下文标识符。

span.span: Gets the session context identifier
The session context identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨所有会话令牌是唯一的上下文标识符。The context identifier is unique across all session tokens. 类使用的上下文 ID 和密钥生成来生成中的令牌的密钥。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 类将为此属性序列化为``的子元素``元素。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndpointId As String
public: property System::String ^ EndpointId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取限定此标识范围的终点 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of the endpoint to which this token is scoped.
The ID of the endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果属性是`null`，全局划分作用域由该会话令牌被视为类。If the property is `null`, the session token is treated as globally scoped by the class. 这可能会造成潜在的安全风险。This can present a potential security risk.

public: virtual property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此标记的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier of this token.
The token ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将为此属性序列化为`Id`属性的``元素。The class serializes this property as the `Id` attribute of the `` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPersistent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否保留此标记表示的 Cookie 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.

value.span: 如果 cookie 为持久的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie is persistent; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，cookie 编写为持久性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the cookie is written as a persistent cookie. 在到期之前关闭浏览器后，持久性 cookie 保持有效。Persistent cookies remain valid after the browser is closed until they expire.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示引用安全令牌是否在会话模式下运行的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.

value.span: 如果标记在会话模式操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the token is operating in session mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在引用模式下，在序列化期间生成一个简单的项目和与令牌处理程序相关联的令牌缓存中存储的令牌的材料。In reference mode, a simple artifact is produced during serialization and the token material is stored in the token cache that is associated with the token handler. 令牌缓存是派生的类的实例。The token cache is an instance of a class that derives from . 对于 Web 场方案中，令牌缓存必须运行跨服务器场中的所有节点。For Web Farm scenarios, the token cache must operate across all nodes in the farm. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作提供的处理程序的 Microsoft 建议中的 global.asax.cs 文件和设置事件令牌上的属性中传递属性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌引用的每个请求的模式下运行，并且更倾向于只设置会话身份验证模块上的属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyEffectiveTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyEffectiveTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取此安全令牌有效的时间。

span.span: Gets the time instant from which the key in this token is valid.
The time instant from which the key is effective.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyExpirationTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyExpirationTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取此安全令牌失效之后的有效的时间。

span.span: Gets the time instant after which the key in this token is no longer valid.
The time instant at which the key expires.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyGeneration As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ KeyGeneration { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该标记中用于密钥生成的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token

value.span: 标记中生成密钥的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier for the key generation in this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中是唯一的会话令牌。The property is unique within a session token. 当会话令牌颁发时具有仅限上下文 ID，这是可通过访问属性。When a session token is issued it has only a context ID, which is accessible through the property. 续订的会话令牌时，将添加密钥生成。When the session token is renewed, the key generation is added. 类使用的上下文 ID 和密钥生成来生成中的令牌的密钥。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 类将为此属性序列化为``的子元素``元素。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecureConversationVersion As Uri
public: property Uri ^ SecureConversationVersion { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 URI，标识用于序列化此会话安全令牌的 WS 安全会话的版本。

span.span: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.

value.span: 一个 URI，标识用于序列化此令牌的 WS 安全会话的版本。

span.span: The URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类支持 WS 安全会话 Feb2005 和 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3。The base class supports WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 and WS-Secure Conversation 1.3. 对于这些版本的 Ws-secure Conversation Uri 是"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc"和"http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512"分别。The URIs for these versions of WS-Secure Conversation are "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc" and "http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512" respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SecurityKeys As ReadOnlyCollection(Of SecurityKey)

summary.span: 获取与此会话关联的键 。

span.span: Gets the keys associated with this session.

summary.span: 这通常是一个唯一密钥。

span.span: This is usually a single key.
The keys associated with the session.

value.span: 这通常是一个唯一密钥。

span.span: There is usually a single key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 默认实现不使用此属性。The default implementation does not use this property. 签名和加密密钥由应用的 cookie 转换处理该令牌。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.

value.span: 从标记变为有效的时间。

span.span: The time from which the token is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValidTo As DateTime
public: virtual property DateTime ValidTo { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取时间不再有效之后的有效的时间。

span.span: Gets the time instant after which the token is no longer valid.

value.span: 标记之后的时间不再有效。

span.span: The time after which the token is no longer valid.
